project.name: Apache Accumulo Project
project.description: Apache Accumulo is a sorted, distributed key/value store based on Google's BigTable design. It is built on top of Apache Hadoop, Zookeeper, and Thrift. It features a few novel improvements on the BigTable design in the form of cell-level access labels and a server-side programming mechanism that can modify key/value pairs at various points in the data management process.

property.name: message
property.value: Javadoc @see does not need @link: pick one or the other.

property.value: Please use Guava Preconditions not JLine

properties.extraTestArgs: --add-opens java.base/java.lang=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.util=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.io=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.net=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.management/java.lang.management=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.management/sun.management=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.security=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.lang.reflect=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.util.concurrent=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.util.concurrent.atomic=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.time=ALL-UNNAMED
